prototype.name: X/O
Piece
prototype.description: Marker for playing X or O

prototype.name: Supply
Supply of player's pieces
prototype.description: Place to hold a player's unused pieces.

prototype.name: Board
Playing Board
prototype.description: Board with spaces for placing the pieces.

stage.name: Setup
Setting Up
stage.description: Put the board on the table. Put all the supply areas on the table. Put all the pieces on the supply area corresponding to the player. Next, start the first turn.

stage.name: Turn
Player Turn
stage.description: Put a piece from the supply onto an empty space on the board that does not finish a row of three. Next, start the next turn. Or Put a piece from the supply onto an empty space on the board that finishes a row of three. Next, the game is finished.

stage.name: Game Over
Game Over
stage.description: A player has won the game!
